script: Imagine your brain has a superpower—it can focus on the most important parts of a sentence to understand meaning. That’s exactly what transformers do! They use something called attention to weigh words differently, like how you’d pay more attention to ‘not’ in ‘I did not eat the cake.’ This helps AI understand context, like knowing ‘bank’ can mean money or a river. Why does it matter? Without attention, AI would struggle to grasp nuance—transformers make language models smart and adaptable. Cool, right?
